content: Although I agree with most of the comments, it just isn't fair for those that are responsible and have fallen on hard times. I mean the families that bought homes within their budget, paid their bills and then lost their jobs and homes. It seems to be that the more outrageous you are in the US, the more things are given to you. I understand that these babies need support and help, but there should also be stipulations on what the mother can and cannot do. She complains endlessly that she wants her privacy but she is on every show on TV. It is very sad when the only way you will ever get helped if you do something totally irresponsible, outlandish, and completely out of the norm.

reply: Although I agree with most of the comments, it just isn't fair for those that are responsible and have fallen on hard times. I mean the families that bought homes within their budget, paid their bills and then lost their jobs and homes. It seems to be that the more outrageous you are in the US, the more things are given to you. I understand that these babies need support and help, but there should also be stipulations on what the mother can and cannot do. She complains endlessly that she wants her privacy but she is on every show on TV. It is very sad when the only way you will ever get helped if you do something totally irresponsible, outlandish, and completely out of the norm.
title: Octuplets' Mother May Get New Home, Nursing Care

You I think are one of those who will live to 110 or longer. I dunno, Tank. I have noticed that kids in my neighborhood are very intrigued by "opposites". The more their lazy indolent parents hate me.... the more they secretly worship and try to copy me, LOL. My mom put it in an interesting way one time to my dad, who thought I should be a (female) clone of him. She says to him, "She's part me, part you, and part the way God made her." Every creation has something that is uniquely theirs. Just as there's always a black sheep in every family, there is also, alternatively, always a white sheep. I think that's because God is the one who has His way, ultimately. So no.... I STILL disagree with you. Much as I loves you. Not to say that NONE of her pups will emulate her. But I think she is too uniquely weird, and when they suffer under their raising, they won't go there. Bet ya ten bucks none of them has a huge family themselves.
